Title: Inventory Operations
Description: Manage inventory items, locations, and quantities.

Topics.Title: Viewing Inventory
Topics.Content:
Viewing Inventory

The Inventory tab provides a real-time view of all WIP items.

  • Search: Use the search bar to find items by Part Number, Job Number, or Location.
  • Filtering: Use the column headers to sort and filter the grid.
  • Right Panel: Toggle the Right Panel (Ctrl+Right Arrow) to see detailed information about the selected item.

Topics.Title: Advanced Entry
Topics.Summary: Use Advanced Inventory for complex transactions.
Topics.Content:
Advanced Inventory Entry

For high-volume or complex data entry, use the Advanced Inventory mode (Ctrl+Shift+A).

Modes

  • Single Entry: Detailed form for adding one item at a time with full validation.
  • Multi Entry: Rapidly add multiple items to the same location or job.
  • Import: Import inventory data from Excel spreadsheets.

Use the toggle buttons at the top of the Advanced Inventory screen to switch between these modes.

Topics.Title: Adding Inventory
Topics.Content:
Adding New Inventory

To add a new item:

  1. Navigate to the Inventory tab.
  2. Enter the Part Number (or scan a barcode).
  3. Enter the Quantity.
  4. Select or scan the Location.
  5. Click Save (Ctrl+S).

The system will validate the part number against the Infor Visual database before saving.
